value.title: Deployment Pipelines give you more CONTROL (Power BI Premium)
value.excerpt: With Deployment Pipelines, you can control your application life cycle stages. Keep content in sync at the different stages of your development. Power BI Premium is required. value.title: Deep dive into measure filters in Power BI Desktop

value.title: Incremental Refresh with Power BI Premium
